nodes.text: Fixer was an MSE-6 series repair droid who lived on the junk planet of Zoh. On Zoh, Fixer and other droids were led by Jek-14. Shorty after the Freemakers visited Zoh seeking Jek-14's help, a ungrateful droid named N-3RO led a droid uprising against Jek-14 and the Freemakers. N-3RO succeeded to convince his fellow droids, including Fixer that humans can not be trusted. They failed and N-3RO was still on Zoh and had been fitted for a restraining bolt.
Fixer first appeared in LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures but was later canonized by Star Wars: Droidography.
